channel.title: Nulling problem [PI]
channel.description: Well i got this problem with nulling. A player of mine done this and it sent this error. He makes somesort of emote or something and it sends this error. [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 13827 at client.method101(client.java:9794) at client.method96(client.java:9563) at client.method114(client.java:11003) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:4 at client.processGameLoop(client.java:346 at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Nulling problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

It doesn’t crash the server just crashes other peoples clients…

Read full topic

item.title: Nulling problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

nulling? what? do you know what null is? lol

what you have there is an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, I don’t know where you got null from.

Read full topic
